title: [Rumor Woods, Hammer Way]
description: A wagon filled with sawdust is parked in the middle of the road, its driver nowhere in sight.  A small group of children astride stick horses brandish aspen branches streaming gold banderoles, laughing and shouting as they charge at each other in turn.  A line of merchant stalls along one side of the road appear to have recently been afire, the scorched aspen wood still smoldering.

A wagon filled with sawdust is parked in the middle of the road, its driver nowhere in sight.  A small group of children astride stick horses brandish aspen branches streaming cobalt banderoles, laughing and shouting as they charge at each other in turn.  A line of merchant stalls along one side of the road appear to have recently been afire, the scorched aspen wood still smoldering.

A wagon filled with sawdust is parked in the middle of the road, its driver nowhere in sight.  A small group of children astride stick horses brandish aspen branches streaming red banderoles, laughing and shouting as they charge at each other in turn.  A line of merchant stalls along one side of the road appear to have recently been afire, the scorched aspen wood still smoldering.

A wagon filled with sawdust is parked in the middle of the road, its driver nowhere in sight.  A small group of children astride stick horses brandish aspen branches streaming royal blue banderoles, laughing and shouting as they charge at each other in turn.  A line of merchant stalls along one side of the road appear to have recently been afire, the scorched aspen wood still smoldering.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, west, northwest
